arts.ttl: Marco Baroni Rues ‘Avoidable’ Lazio Mistakes in Napoli Draw, Backs Underperforming Starter
arts.sum: Lazio coach Marco Baroni wasn’t happy to settle for the solitary point in the 2-2 draw against league leaders Napoli. The Background Gustav Isaksen gave the home side the lead with a long-range pearler much to the delight of the Stadio Olimpico, but Ivan Provedel’s miss-hit pass sparked an equalizer through Giacomo Raspadori. arts.sum: Serie A leaders Napoli shared the spoils with top-four hopefuls Lazio in a topsy-turvy 2-2 draw at the Stadio Olimpico.
